resources.string: I can understand the content of any image and I\'ll try to describe it as any human would.\nI\'m still learning so I\'ll hold onto your photo, but no personal info.

Captionr is a wrapper app for Microsoft's computer vision engine.

I won't keep any of the data you provide, although Microsoft might do that.

The source code is available here.
By watching the ad below, you are supporting the development of Captionr.
Make sure you\'re connected to the Internet
